title: Budget
context: §180-16 Budget. The department of land and natural resources shall submit to the director of finance, annually the budgetary estimates and information required by chapter 37, and shall include therein estimates of the financial requirements of the department. All contributions, moneys, and funds received by any district shall be deposited to the credit of the state general fund. [L 1947, c 191, §10; RL 1955, §28-19; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 13, §2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §§14, 22; am L 1961, c 132, §2; am L 1963, c 114, §1; am L 1967, c 145, §§1, 2; HRS §180-16; am L 1993, c 280, §51]
